tasks.description: Implement `cleanupLocalChange` function in `internal/pr/worktree.go` to remove local change directory
Call `cleanupLocalChange` after successful PR creation in `executeWorkflow` (for both archive and remove modes)
Display warning message before cleanup: "Cleaning up local change directory: spectr/changes/<id>/"
Add test for PR archive with local cleanup
Add test for PR remove with local cleanup
Manual testing: create change with tasks.json, run `spectr pr rm`, verify local cleanup
